popover.primary: A mastery path focused on immediate, direct effects
A mastery path focused on longer-duration effects
A mastery path focused on wide-area effects

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 1468 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects all groupmates within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for {ABIL_3884_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {ABIL_3884_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, and they will deal {ABIL_3876_COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {ABIL_3876_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Ancestor's Blessing
data.description: Healing abilities have a 25% chance to also increase your target's AP by 50. This effect will not work on yourself.
data.rawDescription: Healing abilities have a 25% chance to also increase your target's AP by {COM_1_VAL0}. This effect will not work on yourself.

data.name: Ancestor's Echo
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to 475 damage over 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to {ABIL_3470_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} over {ABIL_3470_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Increases your Armor by 660.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Armor by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Blessing of Grungni
data.description: Critical direct heals will Bless your target for 10 seconds, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.
data.rawDescription: Critical direct heals will Bless your target for {ABIL_3777_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.

data.name: Blessing of Valaya
data.description: Heals all group members within 100 feet for 643 health.
data.rawDescription: Heals all group members within 100 feet for {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.
data.rawDescription: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Cleansing Vitality
data.description: Rune of Cleansing will now heal the defensive target for 387 over 9 seconds if an effect was successfully removed.
data.rawDescription: Rune of Cleansing will now heal the defensive target for {ABIL_3993_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {ABIL_3993_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} if an effect was successfully removed.

data.name: Concussive Runes
data.description: Rune of Cleaving grows ever more potent and now also reduces Armor by 618.
data.rawDescription: Rune of Cleaving grows ever more potent and now also reduces Armor by {ABIL_1597_COM_3_VAL0}.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Willpower by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.
data.rawDescription: A strong heal that will restore {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage, but all of your casted heals become {COM_1_VAL1}% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.
data.rawDescription: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} from melee abilities.

data.name: Earth's Shielding
data.description: Each attack against an active Rune of Shielding will randomly debuff one of the attacker's stats by 75 for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Each attack against an active Rune of Shielding will randomly debuff one of the attacker's stats by {ABIL_3472_COM_0_VAL0} for {ABIL_3472_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Efficient Runecarving
data.description: While under the effects of your Rune of Breaking; you gain 10% disrupt strikethrough and each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt.
data.rawDescription: While under the effects of your Rune of Breaking; you gain 10% disrupt strikethrough and each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Extended Battle
data.description: Increases the area of effect of Rune of Cleaving and Rune of Battle by 50%.
data.rawDescription: Increases the area of effect of Rune of Cleaving and Rune of Battle by 50%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Grimnir's Fury
data.description: Resurrects all fallen groupmembers within 30 feet, and does not cause Resurrection Sickness.  Anyone resurrected by this effect will regain 50% of their hit points.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects all fallen groupmembers within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, and does not cause Resurrection Sickness.  Anyone resurrected by this effect will regain 50% of their hit points.

data.name: Grimnir's Shield
data.description: You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.
data.rawDescription: You will take only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage and your abilities will cost {COM_1_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Grungni's Gift
data.description: Grungni blesses your target, restoring 277 health.
data.rawDescription: Grungni blesses your target, restoring {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.

data.name: Immolating Grasp
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Immolation has a 25% chance to drain 30 Action Points from the target and snare them by 40% for 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Each tick of Rune of Immolation has a 25% chance to drain {ABIL_3500_COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS} from the target and snare them by {ABIL_3500_COM_0_VAL0}% for {ABIL_3500_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Master Rune of Adamant
data.note: You may only have 1 Master Rune active
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Heals Groupmates within 100 feet of the Rune of Adamant for 144 health every 3 seconds while the Master rune is active.
data.rawDescription: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Heals Groupmates within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of the Rune of Adamant for {COM_1_VAL0_HEALTH} every {COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS} while the Master rune is active.

data.name: Master Rune of Fury
data.note: You may only have 1 Master Rune active
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Groupmates within the 100 feet of the Rune of Fury have a 20% chance to gain 50 AP whenever they activate an ability.
data.rawDescription: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Groupmates within the 100 feet of the Rune of Fury have a 20% chance to gain {COM_2_VAL0} AP whenever they activate an ability.

data.name: Master Rune of Speed
data.note: You may only have 1 Master Rune active
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Groupmates within 100 feet of the Rune of Speed have their buildup times reduced by 0.25 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Groupmates within 100 feet of the Rune of Speed have their buildup times reduced by 0.25 seconds.

data.name: Mountain Spirit
data.description: Increases the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by 1320 and resists by 504 for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by {COM_0_VAL0} and resists by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Oath Rune of Iron
data.description:
Increases the targeted group member's Initiative and Willpower by 50 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict 496 Elemental damage over 9 seconds.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
Increases the targeted group member's Initiative and Willpower by {COM_0_VAL0} for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict {ABIL_3870_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {ABIL_3870_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Power
data.description:
Increases the target group member's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by 50 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate to inflict 243 Elemental damage to a target.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
Increases the target group member's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by {COM_0_VAL0} for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate to inflict {ABIL_3869_COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to a target.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Sanctuary
data.description:
Increases the targeted group member's Toughness by 80 for 1 hour. The rune holder will then be able to resurrect themselves with 20% health if killed within the next 10 minutes. Doing so will remove the Oath Rune.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
Increases the targeted group member's Toughness by {COM_5_VAL0} for 1 hour. The rune holder will then be able to resurrect themselves with 20% health if killed within the next 10 minutes. Doing so will remove the Oath Rune.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Warding
data.description:
Increases all of the targeted group member's resistances by 157 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict 356 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to all targets within 30 feet.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
Increases all of the targeted group member's resistances by {COM_0_VAL0} for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict {ABIL_3868_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {ABIL_3868_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to all targets within {ABIL_3868_COM_0_RADI_FEET}.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: On Your Feet!
data.description: Rune of Life, Rune of Sanctuary and Grimnir's Fury will heal the target for 444 health over 5 seconds and will restore 70 Action Points when the target is resurrected.
data.rawDescription: Rune of Life, Rune of Sanctuary and Grimnir's Fury will heal the target for {ABIL_3878_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3878_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and will restore {ABIL_3878_COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS} when the target is resurrected.

data.name: Potent Runes
data.description: Rune of Striking and Rune of Immolation are now undefendable.
data.rawDescription: Rune of Striking and Rune of Immolation are now undefendable.

data.name: Protection of the Ancestors
data.description: Increases the target group member's Wounds by 100 for 60 seconds, healing them for the value of the additional HP gained.
data.rawDescription: Increases the target group member's Wounds by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, healing them for the value of the additional HP gained.

data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Regenerative Shielding
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Regeneration has a 25% chance to increase the target's armor by 1056 for 10 seconds. Additionally, 10% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.
data.rawDescription: Each tick of Rune of Regeneration has a 25% chance to increase the target's armor by {ABIL_3875_COM_0_VAL0} for {ABIL_3875_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Additionally, {ABIL_3875_COM_1_VAL1}% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.description: You heal the ram for 5625 health over the next 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You heal the ram for {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ACTIONPOINTS} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Rune of Battle
data.description:
Buffs you or a friendly player with a pulsing area of effect that deals 259 Elemental damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within to 30 feet for 15 seconds.

Not affected by cooldown reduction abilities.
data.rawDescription:
Buffs you or a friendly player with a pulsing area of effect that deals {COM_1_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} every {COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS} to all enemies within to {COM_1_RADI_FEET} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

Not affected by cooldown reduction abilities.

data.name: Rune of Binding
data.description: Wounds your target for 248 Elemental damage and Staggers the target for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.
data.rawDescription: Wounds your target for {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} and Staggers the target for {ABIL_3028_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Rune of Breaking
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you gain the Rune of Breaking, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you gain the Rune of Balance, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.
data.rawDescription:
When this ability is toggled on, you gain the Rune of Breaking, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you gain the Rune of Balance, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.

data.name: Rune of Burning
data.description: You channel a powerful series of runes around your target which project searing flame into them, dealing 1365 Elemental damage over 6 seconds and snaring them by 40% for as long as you maintain your concentration.
data.rawDescription: You channel a powerful series of runes around your target which project searing flame into them, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and snaring them by 40% for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.description: Your rune cleanses an ally, removing one Curse or Ailment.
data.rawDescription: Your rune cleanses an ally, removing one Curse or Ailment.

data.rawDescription: Restores life to a slain ally, reviving them with 20% of their health.

data.name: Rune of Preservation
data.description: A defensive rune which wards you from your target, reducing all damage that they deal to you by 50% for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

Your rune infuses the target with vitality, restoring 883 health.

Your rune infuses the target with vitality, restoring {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Rune of Serenity
data.description: Heals your target for 507 health over 9 seconds, and will then bounce to and heal other allies within 30 feet of the previous target. This effect will not apply itself to the same target more than once, and will heal up to 6 people.

This effect will not apply itself to the same target more than once, and will heal up to 6 people.

data.rawDescription: Increases the critical chance of Rune of Fire, Grungni's Gift, and Rune of Striking by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.rawDescription: Ranged siege engines will deal {COM_0_VAL0}% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.rawDescription: Your target suffers {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.rawDescription: Removes the cooldown of Rune of Cleansing, but increases the cost to 40 Action Points.

data.rawDescription: Rune of Mending and Rune of Serenity can no longer be set back when casting.
